name: Tabaiba Apartamentos
description: This hotel is located in Teguise (Costa Teguise), close to Las Cucharas Beach, Cesar Manrique Foundation, and Costa Teguise Golf Club. Area attractions also include Cactus Garden and Sports City of Lanzarote.

name: Apartamentos Tabaiba Lanzarote Paradise
description: This aparthotel is located in Teguise (Costa Teguise), close to the beach, Las Cucharas Beach, Cesar Manrique Foundation, and Costa Teguise Golf Club. Area attractions also include Cactus Garden and Sports City of Lanzarote.

name: Hotel L'Esagono
description: This hotel is located in San Teodoro (San Teodoro - Budoni), close to San Teodoro Port, San Teodoro Beach, and Port Ottiolu. Regional attractions also include Castello della Fava and Marina Maria Beach.
longDestinationName: Costa Esmeralda - Olbia - Eastern Sardinia, Italy

name: Aparthotel Isla de Cabrera
description: This family-friendly apartment is located in Ses Salines (Colonia Sant Jordi), close to Es Trenc Beach. Regional attractions also include Cala Santany Beach and Cala Figuera Beach.

name: Baramee Hip Hotel
description: This hotel is located in Kathu (Patong), close to the beach, Bangla Boxing Stadium, Patong Beach, and Bangla Night Street. Also nearby are Patong Boxing Stadium and Bazaan Fresh Market.

name: The Arrabelle at Vail Square, A RockResort
description:
• This smoke-free, ski-in/ski-out hotel is located at the base of Vail Mountain, just steps away from the Eagle Bahn gondola.

  • The Arrabelle at Vail Square, A RockResort's accommodations include flat-panel TVs, DVD players, fireplaces, and refrigerators.

  • The hotel features ski rental, spa services (beginning in March 2008), and an outdoor swimming pool. There is a bar in the lobby and an on-site restaurant.
longDestinationName: Vail - Beaver Creek (ski area), Colorado, United States of America

name: Mantra Samui Resort
description: Situated near the airport, in Koh Samui, this luxury resort is close to Bo Phut Beach, Fishermans Village, and Samui Go Kart. Also nearby are Bo Phut Beach Pier and Mae Nam Beach Pier.

name: Hotel Balmoral
description: The  Balmoral  is an affordable  hotel in Benalmádena Costa  situated along the breathtaking  Costa del Sol  in Spain. Balmoral is conveniently located just 8 km/4 miles from Malaga Airport and close to spectacular beaches so it is perfectly situated for your holiday or short break in Spain.      Balmoral is just steps away from an  exciting casino  and the lovely  sandy beaches  along the  Costa del Sol  where guests can enjoy sunbathing and swimming along the tranquil beaches or take a short drive or bus ride to the more lively beaches near Malaga.        At Balmoral, guests will find a  swimming pool with children’s pool  as well as lovely  meeting rooms and banquet halls  if requiring a venue for a special event. The resort also features 2 bars and plenty of activities, including tennis and darts.

name: Hotel Punta Negra
description: This Alghero hotel is located near the bay and set on its own private white sand beach, a short distance from Nuraghe di Palmavera, Le Bombarde, and Lazzaretto Beach. Local attractions also include Maria Pia Beach and San Giovanni Beach.

name: Baramee Resortel
description: Welcome to Hotel Baramee Resortel, your  best accommodation choice in Patong Beach, Phuket . This affordable hotel, decorated in a modern oriental style and with high class amenities, offers the perfect retreat for couples and families with children who are looking for relaxation.  A combination of charming oriental hospitality together with a friendly personalized service and high class facilities creates the best choice for a memorable holiday experience in Thailand. Furthermore, the Hotel Baramee Resortel is situated only a few minutes by foot from the wonderful Patong Beach.  In addition to modernly furnished accommodations, some with sea view, the hotel Baramee Resortel amenities include an international restaurant, massage services, an outdoor swimming pool, a children's pool and a stylish pool bar.

name: Hotel Saint Raphael
description: Situated near the beach in Barano D'Ischia, this hotel is close to Maronti Beach, Sant'Angelo Beach and Cartaromana Beach. Local attractions also include Guevara Tower and Diocesan Museum.

name: Primotel Brescia
description: Ancient farm-stead, completely renewed in 2000, Primotel Brescia Centro is near at the ring road and a few steps from the exit of the highway Brescia Centro.  Reception, living-room, little meeting rooms, lift, terrace, bar.  Ideal position for businessman and passing through persons.

name: Hotel Tunisian Village
description: Situated near the beach in Hammamet, this hotel is close to Omar Khayam Beach and Bel Azur Beach. Area attractions also include Hammamet Souk and Nabeul Beach.

name: Cruccuris Resort
description: Traditional terracotta-hued Mediterranean resort situated in Villasimius, on the south-east coast of Sardinia; the marine protected Campulongu Beach is one kilometre away.

name: Caribbean World Hammamet
streetAddress: Avenue de la Paix - Zone Touristique Su
description: This Hammamet hotel is in the city center, nestled on a private white sand beach and within easy reach of area attractions such as Port Yasmine, Hammamet Beach, and Casino La Medina. Local attractions also include Carthage Land and Citrus Golfcourse.

name: Bachelor Gulch Village
description:
• Bachelor Gulch Village offers ski-in/ski-out access to interconnecting trails between three ski areas of Beaver Creek.

  • Individually decorated, smoke-free, condominiums feature gourmet kitchens, fireplaces, and balconies or patios.

  • Complimentary 24-hour shuttle service is provided within the Bachelor Gulch and Beaver Creek villages.
longDestinationName: Vail - Beaver Creek (ski area), Colorado, United States of America

name: Ocean Surf Hotel
description: The pink-and-aqua Ocean Surf Hotel, built in 1940, is across the street from the ocean in North Beach, two miles from Bal Harbour shops.
longDestinationName: Miami (and vicinity), Florida, United States of America

name: Park Hyatt Beaver Creek Resort and Spa
description: Located between the pedestrian-only Beaver Creek Village and the base of Beaver Creek Mountain, this ski-in/ski-out resort is 28 miles east of Eagle County Airport and 8 miles west of Vail.
longDestinationName: Vail - Beaver Creek (ski area), Colorado, United States of America

name: Caribbean World Beach & Garden
description: This Hammamet hotel is in the entertainment district, nestled on a private sand beach and within easy reach of area attractions such as Port Yasmine, Hammamet Beach, and Casino La Medina. Local attractions also include Carthage Land and Citrus Golfcourse.

name: Hotel Plaza Playa
description: This hotel is located in Playa del Carmen (Avenida Constituyentes), close to Nuestra Senora del Carmen Catholic Church, Playa del Carmen Main Beach, and Central Square. Also nearby are Mamitas Beach Club and Pier Navega.

name: Grand Midwest Hotel Apartments - Bur Dubai
description: Grand Midwest Deluxe Hotel Apartments located in the heart of Bur Dubai area just behind the Burjuman Shopping Mall and Major International Banks like Citi Bank. 108 units consit of Studio, 1,2 and 3 bed room units fully furnished with modern kitchen facilities and 24 hours room service. Full property having WI- Fi Internet facility, conference facility and Health club facilities with Swimming pool. Walking distance to Banks, Shopping Malls, Textile Market and Major Dubai attractions. Close to the World trade Centre exhibition hall

name: Royal Park Albatros
description: This family-friendly apartment is located in San Miguel de Abona, close to Golf del Sur and San Miguel Castle. Area attractions also include Camel Park and La Tejita Beach.

name: Citin Loft Hua Hin
description: Sits at the heart of Hua Hin,a charming, peaceful and friendly coastal town. easy to explore the town and its attractions,Hua Hin Railway Station,Thailand's most beautiful,Klai Kang Won Palace.the beach front.

name: Lavender Luxury Villas and Spa
streetAddress: Jalan By Pass Ngurah Rai No. 7
description: Situated near the airport, in Kuta, this hotel is close to Mall Bali Galeria, Honorary Consulate of the Netherlands, and Swiss Consulate. Also nearby are Kuta Beach and Tuban Beach.

name: The Lodge at Vail, A RockResort
description: Nestled at the base of Vail Mountain, this European-inspired lodge was Vail's first, and, as such, offers a prime location-right in the center of Vail Village next to the Vista Bahn chairlift.
longDestinationName: Vail - Beaver Creek (ski area), Colorado, United States of America

name: Hotel dei Pini
description:
• Sardinian holiday resort overlooking white sand beach, seven kilometres from Alghero beside Porto Conte Natural Park.


  • Air-conditioned guestrooms feature simple white and blue decor and all have Internet access and cable television.


  • Guests can try Sardinian cuisine in the restaurant, go mountain biking in the woods and relax on the beach.

name: Diamond Cottage Resort & Spa
description:
• On a hillside at the southern end of Karon Beach, this resort is in the shopping and restaurant district.

  • Diamond Cottage Resort & Spa guestrooms include Thai décor and balconies, as well as minibars and refrigerators.

  • The resort offers a full-service spa, two large outdoor pools and a children’s pool, a restaurant, and two lounges.

name: Yasmine Beach
description: Located in Yasmine Hammamet, this 282-room resort has traditional Tunisian architecture and faces its own private stretch of sandy beach, five kilometres from the Medina of Hammamet.

name: Splendid Star Grand Hotel
streetAddress: No. 14 Tho Xuong Lane, Au Trieu str
description: Located in the heart of Hanoi, this family-friendly hotel is within walking distance of St. Joseph Cathedral, Hang Gai Street, and Hoan Kiem Lake. Also nearby are Trang Tien Plaza and Vietnamese National Tuong Theatre.

name: Moon Valley Hotel Apartments
description:
• Modern four-storey hotel situated in the centre of Dubai, three kilometres from museums and nine kilometres from the beach.


  • Apartments have modern decor in neutral tones with cherry wood furniture; all include kitchenettes and satellite television.


  • Guests can unwind in the sauna or steam room, enjoy a swim or a work out, or relax with non-alcoholic drinks in the bar.

name: Townsend Place
description:
• Surrounded by aspens, these condos offer ski-in/ski-out access to the Elkhorn chairlift via skier bridge and tunnel.

  • The well-equipped units have one or two bedrooms, full kitchens, wood-burning fireplaces, balconies, VCRs, and washer/dryers.

  • Guest parking is complimentary, and a complimentary shuttle serves the nearby Strawberry Park and Centennial lifts.
longDestinationName: Vail - Beaver Creek (ski area), Colorado, United States of America

name: Best Western Bonita Springs Hotel & Suites
description: Situated in Bonita Springs, this inn is close to Flamingo Island Flea Market, Naples-Fort Myers Greyhound Track, and Everglades Wonder Gardens. Local attractions also include Riverside Park and Bonita Fairways Golf Club.
longDestinationName: Naples (and vicinity), Florida, United States of America

name: Carib Club
streetAddress: No.22 Carib Club Drive, Long Bay
description: Situated near the beach in Providenciales, this aparthotel is close to The Regent Village Shopping Mall, Sibonne Beach and Salt Mills Plaza. Area attractions also include Turtle Cove.
longDestinationName: Turks and Caicos (all), Turks and Caicos

name: Hotel San Marcos
description: Inaugurated in the early 40s, San Marcos Versare is one of the leaders in Punta del Estes hotel industry. Since then, it has played a leading role, incorporating new services and innovations, remaining as one of the local favorites.

name: Eurostars Hacienda Vista Real Hotel
description: Located on the Riviera Maya, this hotel is next to the Playacar Golf Club, 1 km (0.5 mi) from downtown Playa del Carmen.

name: The Album Loft at Phuket
description: This hotel is located in Kathu (Patong), close to Bazaan Fresh Market, Bangla Night Street, and Patong Beach. Also nearby are Bangla Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center.

name: Club Marazul
description: This apartment is located in Adeje (Costa Adeje), where area attractions include Golf Costa Adeje, Alcala Beach, and Del Duque Beach. Area attractions also include Bobo Beach and Puerto Colon.

name: Geneva Hotel
description: This hotel is located in Miami Beach (South Beach), close to the beach, Anchor Shops, Lummus Park Beach, and New World Symphony Park. Also nearby are Lincoln Road Mall and Art Deco Welcome Center.
longDestinationName: Miami (and vicinity), Florida, United States of America

name: Four Seasons Resort Vail
description: This is a 10 stories high building. The architechtural and interior style of the building will incorporate arts and crafts detailing, to provide a slightly different approach than the traditional Bavarian style prevalent in Vail. The breadth of amenities provided within Four Seasons Resort Vail makes it a *destination unto itself* allowing visitors to live all aspects of their life here.
longDestinationName: Vail - Beaver Creek (ski area), Colorado, United States of America

name: The St. Regis Mauritius Resort
description: Situated by the ocean, this luxury resort is close to Le Morne Beach and Le Morne Mountain. Area attractions also include Chamarel Falls and Seven Coloured Earths.

name: Santhiya Koh Phangan Resort & Spa
description:
• Set on a tropical hillside overlooking the beach, this resort is on the northern tip of Koh Phangan in the Gulf of Thailand.

  • Santhiya Resort and Spa guestrooms and villas offer the rich warmth of teak wood and a variety of sea or garden views.

  • The resort offers a large oceanfront swimming pool, water sports equipment including kayaks, a Thai spa, and restaurants.

name: Lanta Pavilion Resort
description: This Ko Lanta resort is in the entertainment district, situated on a private beach near area attractions such as Khlong Toab Beach and Long Beach. Area attractions also include Klong Nin Beach and Klong Dao Beach.

name: Lotus Blanc Resort
description: Situated near the airport, in the city center, this resort is close to Cambodian Cultural Village, Wat Kesararam, and Lucky Mall Super Market. Also nearby are Angkor Shopping Center and Royal Garden.

name: Alsol Del Mar
description: Located in Cap Cana in the Coral Beach. Conveniently located just 15 minutes from Punta Cana International Airport and 40 minutes from La Romana airport and 2 1/2 hours from Santo Domingo airport. Just minutes away from the famous Punta Espada golf course and near one the best Marinas in the world Cap Cana Marina.

name: Harrison Hotel South Beach
description: Bouthique Courtyard Hotel in the heart of Miami Beach Art Deco District. On Resaurant and Nite Club Row. Near the Beach, Theaters, Museums and ConventionCenter
longDestinationName: Miami (and vicinity), Florida, United States of America

name: Andakira Hotel
description: This hotel is located in Kathu (Patong), close to Patong Boxing Stadium, Patong Beach, and Bangla Night Street. Also nearby are Bangla Boxing Stadium and Bazaan Fresh Market.

name: Vail Cascade Resort & Spa - Destination Hotels & Resorts
description: This resort is nestled along the Gold-Medal waters of Gore Creek, at the western-most base of Vail Mountain; adjacent to chairlift 20, the resort is 1 mile from Lionshead and within 2 miles of Vail.
longDestinationName: Vail - Beaver Creek (ski area), Colorado, United States of America

name: Hammamet Garden
description:
• The hotel, set in lush gardens surrounded by olive groves, is five kilometers from Hammamet center, 400 meters from beach.


  • Air-conditioned rooms have a light décor with traditional Tunisian fabrics; all are equipped with cable television.


  • Guests can bronze on the private beach, enjoy a drink at the poolside bar, or relax with a sauna and full-body massage.

name: The Innsbruck Luxury Condominiums Aspen
description: This Aspen condo is near Wheeler Stallard House Museum, Aspen Mountain, and Aspen Recreation Center. Also nearby are Aspen Center for Environmental Studies at Hallam Lake and Wheeler Opera House.
longDestinationName: Aspen (ski area), Colorado, United States of America

name: Caribbean World Monastir
description:
• Adjacent to the beach, this modern Moorish resort is spread over several buildings and is set 12 kilometres from Monastir.


  • Guestrooms are decorated in light colours with patterned fabrics; all include air conditioning, satellite TVs and balconies.


  • Guests can try a range of international dishes in the hotel’s seven restaurants and cool off in one of the four pools.
